name: DCS - A Choose Your Own Adventure Game
name_original: DCS - A Choose Your Own Adventure Game
description:
Welcome Back! "Cause I'm a silly bum who forgot to commit to his projects." - Jaxy

Back, after a few years. I wanted to make a little pet project and re-apply myself to making games again, since I've got the free time now.

I'll try going back into my old games. Try. I'm more likely to take the ideas and mold them into something better, because they're old. Really old. And one of them technically takes place in Unity and needs more effort and art.

Demon in the Crawl Space (Or DCS) is a horror based choose your own adventure game that follows you (name to be given later) down into your aunt's old home to search for a crawl space filled with some important memorabilia. You'll conure up why you hated this place and even something a little more, crawling around in your old play room.

Please look forward to updates and other news for DCS.

"I'll do my best to update at least once a month if I can. Even if it's minor. Don't feel obligated to pay, please." - Jaxy
